page.title: 09ARMTHORPE MARKHAM MAIN BAND
page.content: {The band was formed}in 1925 as the St. John's Ambulance Band.There was no sh_ ortage of musical talent among the men that found work there:players were set on quite easily.Band members were happy to contribute a sum from their pay packets to buy a{set of 2nd hand {instruments}& in 1929 they were in a position to buy a brand new set of instruments.In 1930 the band was awarded 3rd prize at a contest in Doncaster.In 1930 Mr.E.Griffiths formed{a learners' class}& his own 3 sons graduated through the class becoming leading members of the senior band.In 1939 it won its{1st cup}at Skegness.The band was renamed The Mar_ kham Main Colliery Band in 1945 & clo_ thing coupons given by local people helped buy the 1st uniforms.After this it won many contests & is still very successful.
